intro:
Trendy items for full styling and production fun!
Step into the world of modeling, try out different jobs, and chase your dreams — and maybe even love.
description:
After passing a model audition, you join your uncle’s production agency. But the office is a total mess and the finances are in crisis! Determined to turn things around, you take on a variety of jobs — magazine shoots, TV appearances, brand modeling — and even produce two models from the agency to help boost its success.
Your ultimate goal? The once-a-year special runway show. It’s every model’s dream — aim to be No.1.
Fashion, work, and exciting encounters await you.

◆ Style your perfect look with trendy pieces and custom hair and makeup.
From princess vibes to Harajuku flair, enjoy a wide range of outfits. Tuck in your top or leave it out — express your style your way.
Fine-tune every detail with sliders: outfit and hair color, facial feature size and placement, makeup intensity, and more. Explore subtle fashion tones and looks that reflect your true self.

◆ Rise to the top with TV gigs and brand modeling.
In magazine work, take on themed styling, photo shoots, and article layouts. Get feedback from the editor-in-chief, grow your follower count, and build your popularity as a model.
As your rank rises, unlock special jobs like drama appearances and variety shows in immersive 3D settings.

◆ Produce your agency’s models and level up your production.
Coordinate and produce fellow models to raise your agency’s profile.
As everyone grows, your production level rises too. Aim to become the No.1 agency.

◆ Who will steal your heart? Style him your way and go on dates together.
Work side by side with your crush, go out together, and when you get close, capture photos or videos to share on social media.
Those exciting moments may even enhance your expressiveness as a model — and yes, you can style the boys too.

◆ Enjoy online features with friends.
Connect online to share your model. Show off your favorite looks, take two-shot photos with friends’ models, and check real-time rankings of popular items by brand.
Keep up with the latest trends and use them to inspire your own style.
